scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts Saint Christopher wading through water, carrying the Christ Child on his shoulders. Saint Christopher, a large bearded man wearing a red cloak over a tan tunic, uses a staff to navigate the river. The Christ Child, depicted as a young boy with a halo, sits on his shoulder, holding a globe. Behind them, in the distance, are stylized representations of buildings and a rocky landscape. The entire scene is framed by an architectural element resembling a Gothic arch with decorative tracery.
